alert.note: Alert for Inland Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued January 01 at 4:46PM EST until January 03 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM SUNDAY TO NOON EST MONDAY FOR LAKE MOULTRIE... * WHAT...West winds 15 to 20 knots with gusts up to 25 knots expected. * WHERE...Lake Moultrie. * WHEN...From 1 PM Sunday to noon EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on Lake Moultrie will create hazardous conditions for small craft. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds will likely be more infrequent Sunday afternoon, which are expected to increase behind the passage of the cold front Sunday night. The time period of the strongest gusts is most likely to occur between Sunday night and Monday morning.
info.instruction: Boaters on Lake Moultrie should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft.
